 Joker comic book Wikipedia Joker comic book From Wikipedia free encyclopedia Jump navigation Jump search Joker Cover Joker May June Art by Dick Giordano Publication information Publisher DC Comics Schedule Bi monthly Format Ongoing series Publication date May October No issues Main character s Joker Creative team Created by Bob Kane Bill Finger Written by Elliot S Maggin Dennis O Neil Martin Pasko Penciller s Ernie Chan Jos Luis Garc L pez Irv Novick Inker s Tex Blaisdell Vince Colletta Jos Luis Garc L pez Dick Giordano Frank McLaughlin Joker comic book series published by DC Comics starring supervillain Joker It ran nine issues from May June September October Contents Publication history Issues Unpublished issue Collected editions Animation References External links Publication history edit Dennis O Neil wrote first issue series recounted that stopped by Julie Schwartz Batman editor s office he said We re going do Joker book know that alarms went off could sense problems that such thing would entail but it was job series was launched in May by O Neil artist Irv Novick In order have him work as protagonist writers on series toned down Joker s insanity adhere Comics Code Authority each issue would end with Joker being apprehended only escape at beginning next issue sole exception was issue Joker was killed in end only return in next issue as if nothing had happened with no explanation as he survived Batman did not appear in series Joker was forbidden murder anyone in pages his own magazine Issues edit No May June Joker s Double Jeopardy villain named Senor Alvarez breaks Batman s enemy Two Face out Arkham Asylum insults Joker as being not superior criminal Joker breaks out Arkham decides get revenge prove he superior criminal No July August Sad Saga Willy Weeper Joker teams up with villain called Willy Weeper has habit crying he tries commit crime laughing he sees others cry help him steal platinum after Willy Weeper breaks him out No September October Last Ha Ha After battle with Joker Creeper gets amnesia persuaded by Joker that he Joker s ally No November December Gold Star Joker Joker falls in love with DC hero Green Arrow s girlfriend Dinah Laurel Lance gives her choice marry Joker die No January February Joker Goes Wilde Joker competes with Justice League foes Royal Flush Gang four valuable paintings done by late artist Thaddeus Wilde No March April Sherlock Stalks Joker Joker hits an actor playing famous detective Sherlock Holmes on his head with pipe actor believes he Holmes that Joker Holmes archenemy Professor Moriarty Holmes stalks Joker with help stagehand used be sailor worked on docks named Dock Watson No May June Luthor re Driving Me Sane An experiment Superman villain Lex Luthor s goes awry thanks Joker s interference gives Joker Luthor s genius Luthor Joker s insanity No July August Scarecrow s Fearsome Face Off Joker steals some fear gas from S T R Labs he ends up competing with fellow Batman villain Scarecrow see whose fear based weapon best Joker wins No September October Cat Clown Joker Batman s frenemy Catwoman end up competing movie actor s trained feline sidekick Catwoman s victory leads two way rivalry No October December Dead Joker makes deal with Lou Cipher defeat Justice League kill scientist developing health serum After defeating Flash Black Canary Green Arrow Wonder Woman Joker discovers that while they lack pulse League continues have brainwaves Unpublished issue edit letters page Joker Sept Oct mentions that Martin Pasko was writing Joker vs Justice League America story titled Dead appear in Joker which was never published despite being listed as on sale right now on Daily Planet promotional page August In end notes Greatest Joker Stories Ever Told it noted that Joker editor Julius Schwartz had no recollection this story ever being completed however Pasko found xeroxed pages story which he sold on eBay in cover issue was drawn by Ernie Chan but it was not finished at time Joker was published first time on August in DC s Joker Bronze Age Omnibus which also contains Joker as well as other published Joker stories from s as stand alone issue on October Collected editions edit Greatest Joker Stories Ever Told includes Joker pages January ISBN Joker Clown Prince Crime collects Joker pages November ISBN Joker Bronze Age Omnibus collects Joker pages August ISBN Animation edit Willy Weeper appeared as one time villain in Batman Brave Bold TV episode Joker Vile Villainous voiced by Tim Conway in which Joker recruits him into becoming supervillain again after facing humiliating defeat by Bulletman References edit b Stewart Tom August Joker s Not So Wild Clown Prince Crime in his Own Magazine Back Issue Raleigh North Carolina TwoMorrows Publishing McAvennie Michael Dolan Hannah ed s DC Comics Year By Year Visual Chronicle London United Kingdom Dorling Kindersley p ISBN It may have been an unusual idea at time but writer Denny Oneil artist Irv Novick decided feature villain in his own comic book Joker lasted only nine issues CS maint extra text authors list link O Neil Dennis w Novick Irv p Giordano Dick i Joker s Double Jeopardy
